channel.title: Nulls to skillcapes
channel.description:
I was wondering how to change the skillcapes on my server from nulls to the item Im pretty sure it has something to do with this code
[code] public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) { [/code]

item.title: Nulls to skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

Theres 2 item ID’s for Attack Cape

When I use ::pickup

One of them gives me nothing and gives me a message

CMON TYPE IT AGAIN (I think this is the message on my server when its not valid)

One of them gives me a null

Read full topic

item.title: Nulls to skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“f1rey wav3, post:1, topic:243770”]I was wondering how to change the skillcapes on my server from nulls to the item
Im pretty sure it has something to do with this code

public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) { [/quote]well, you’re wrong :[ Glad you attempted to at least think about it yourself.

But you have to add it to the item.cfg.

Otherwise, the problem is that your client isn’t cooperating with your source.

eg. Source A + Client A = Correct
Source B + Client B = Correct
Source A + Client B = Incorrect

Read full topic
